strawn.longleaf.relay.client

Class RelayClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler
      • strawn.longleaf.relay.netty.RelayMessageHandler
        • strawn.longleaf.relay.client.RelayClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelUpstreamHandler, Connector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelDataCollectorClient, ExampleReceiver, ExampleSender

    public abstract class RelayClient
extends RelayMessageHandler
implements Connector
    Author:
    David Strawn Clients that want to send data to or receive data from the server should extend this class.
